articles.description: People with pica disorder, a compulsive eating problem, consume non-food objects. The frequently consumed substances include dirt, clay and flaking paint.
articles.content:
People with pica disorder, a compulsive eating problem, consume non-food objects. The frequently consumed substances include dirt, clay and flaking paint.

articles.title: Explore NASA Astronomy Image Of The Day, A Magnificent Grand Design Galaxy - Hot Hardware
